summary: A test suite dedicated to verifying the TensorFlow ConvNext V2 model implementation, covering its initialization, forward signature, hidden state outputs, dataset conversion, Keras training integration, pretrained loading, and image classification behavior, while adapting tests to the model's unique input handling.
business_intent: Ensure the ConvNext V2 model for TensorFlow functions correctly and reliably across typical usage scenarios, providing confidence in its API compliance, training compatibility, and inference accuracy for image classification tasks.
